Intro: We're thrilled to invite you to join Hex's MVP stage, a community built by entrepreneurs, for entrepreneurs.
Participation: Your participation is invaluable as we shape our platform. We can't wait to hear your thoughts and ideas.
Benefit1: Early access to our platform and features
Benefit4: Invitations to exclusive events and webinars
ReachOut: Feel free to reach out with any questions or ideas. Your input matters!
Founders: Mateo Toro, Julian Ramirez, and Santiago Saavedra
